description:
As a date inputter part of the admin staff, 
I want to be able to automatically get categories of each pending post,
So that i am able to process the data from the post faster
name: Automatically generate categories

elements.name: Generating categories when text is present in product description

steps.name: I am on "Edit Item Page" for a particular pending post
I click on the "generate categories" button

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `.generate-categories-btn`, but never found it.
    at Context.eval (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:46:6)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:10988:29)
    at Context.eval (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:10309:35)

steps.name: I should see the "categories generated successfully" sign
I click on the "enter categories" text area

elements.name: Attempting to generate categories when text is not present in product description

steps.name: I am on "Edit Item Page" for a particular pending post
I click on the "generate categories" button

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `.generate-categories-btn`, but never found it.
    at Context.eval (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:46:6)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:10988:29)
    at Context.eval (http://localhost:4200/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/category.feature:10309:35)

steps.name: I should see the "categories generated failure" sign
I click on the "enter categories" text area
I should see "no categories found" options
